name: Death Factory
description:
This is an exploratory game of a ruined factory. Unfortunately,  acid spills have rendered the factory dangerous and created aggressive mutants  both inside and out.

In level 1, you must get the game token to shut gain entrance into the core of the factory to disable the spill. You'll start outside and have to obtain the blue key to enter the factory wall (on the right). Once inside, obtain the red key to access the game token. 

In level 2, we experiment with procedurally generated content (PGC). The factory walls will be different every time you play. Collect a score of at least 10 and the win token  will appear at the end of the tunnel.

Game Advancements

1.  Provide a story and corresponding structure to the game world

2. Introduction of additional hazards

3. Scripting for randomly generated content and world structure
